title: Josh Gondelman (BTS Podcast Exclusive)
description:
Comedian Josh Gondelman made his network debut on Late Night recently, and while he was there, he chatted with Late Night opening comic Ryan Reiss about their lives and careers doing stand-up.

Then, hear Josh's set that he performed in Studio 8G.


LATE NIGHT ON SOCIAL
